name: Vlogger Run
description:
Word on the street is that the hottest celebrity vlogger has a meet and greet at the mall today... And that vlogger is you! Your fans are ecstatic... Wait, that writhing mass of people aren't fans: they are unauthorized photographers! Are those media vultures trying to snap photos of you for cheap engagement? Quick, vlogger, RUN! In Vlogger Run, you must escape the HORDE OF MEDIA VULTURES while keeping things friendly with your fans: jump on the platforms and use them to go over obstacles, collect HEARTS left by your fans and slide down to avoid the blinding camera flashes of the PHOTOGRAPHERS! Watch out, you'll lose speed over time! But don't worry, your fans are patiently waiting for a selfie with their favorite celebrity vlogger, and they'll give you a neat speed bonus if you interact with them! 

Controls - PC
Left Mouse Click: Jump
Right Mouse Click: Slide
Left Mouse Click: Interact with fan
Controls - Mobile
Swipe Up: Jump
Swipe Down: Slide
Tap: Interact with fan

Game Artists:
